Articles.Content:
Is there a KSP equivalent to System.IO.Directory.GetFiles() or any workaround to get the list of files.

(KSP.IO.Directory.GetFiles() doesn't work)
In 0.21.x they unlocked System.IO, so you don't need an equivalent or a workaround. (also I've heard no good things about KSP.IO so probably not)
Thanks Greys! Thought System.IO was still not allowed
